tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: completely happy with the doctor consultation.I visited her for period cramps and breast lump issues. She was very friendly and advised necessary tests, suggested  required treatment / procedure.But wait time is more than one could handle,  there's no value for time mentioned in practo's appointment slot which is another drawback. If you are ready to spend your half day at hospital go for it, book an appointment.

tags: None
review:
****** ******* ****** ** ****** **** ************ ** **********One who understands the patient completely and suggests the treatment accordingly.She pays good attention to the patient .One who is like a family doctor in field of gynecologist and one with whom the patient will always  be in safe hands.

My wife had an awesome experience with her during her pregnancy phase.You can always go for consultation with her and forget the worries.

Thanks doctor for extra care that we received both from you and from @Apollo Cradle,Kondapur.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very disappointing experience meeting Dr Padmini Shilpa, gynaecologist. Very poor standard of communication, ****** ** *** ** * ****** ** **** ******* ********* ******** ** ** ********* ****** **** ** ******** ** *** ** **** ** * ******** The doctor spoke with little sensitivity towards the patient *** ******** ** **** ******* ******* ** ****** ********* *** ********** Not expected of Apollo. Never going back.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is our first pregnancy and visited the doctor with lot of questions in our mind. The wait time is over 30-40 mins even though i had booked the appointment prior. I hardly got 3-5 mins of doctors time. She was in hurry *** ******* **** ********* ** ******** **** ***** Gave me couple of tests after test but no explanation what so ever. We get excited and tensed at the same time when we get pregnant for first time and this type of behavior is very intolerant. Moreover she's rude and not at all friendly. We respect doctors and would except the same from them as we are all humans. We wish other mothers to be doesn't experience the same behaviour from her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Today itself I met her for pregnancy related issue,I have bleeding today and got panic but after her consultation I feel so relaxed and my experience was awesome.she is very cooperative,she explains everything very well,very polite. I met with many gynecologist on Hyderabad but I must say none can treat you better as she did.She really valued her every patient.I'm willing to do my further treatment with her only.True gem.Thank you so much ma'am for your consultation.I must recommend her to all of you.I went there with wet eyes and came with smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My whole pregnancy journey was with Dr. Padmini Shilpa in Apollo Cradle Kondapur,she made sure the pregnancy was smooth without any hassle..since mine was a critical case..she helped us to understand and really spend more time to explain every little detail important during pregnancy..also ensured that everything was planned and executed well during and post surgery,a very warm person in nature, will strongly recommend her as a Gynaecologist/ Obstetrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor Padmini is very patient and kind and listens to your problem intently. She takes precautions that if there is any health issue it is uncovered soon. No unnecessary medicines are prescribed by her. She is available on watsapp n phone also to chat. I feel safe with her.

tags: None
review:
We got my mother‚Äôs Hysterectomy done from Apollo Cradle and Dr. Padmini was the surgeon. I‚Äôve to say, she is quite a remarkable Doctor. My mother‚Äôs surgery was successful and she was super friendly throughout the entire process. We highly recommend you to visit Dr. Padmini for any gynaecology related problems. Thank you Doctor for all your support.

Best regards,
Rohit Tambakhe.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Way back in 2019 I  was in dilemma in choosing best gynaecologist for my problems related to PCOD & Pregnancy.  Quiet number of doctors have been visited consultated still couldnt find answers to my problems. Then came to my rescue namely Dr. Padmini Silpa from Apollo Cradle Kondapur. In less than 3 months she helped to get through the problem of PCOD and pregnancy and I was  Pregnant. Simple words can't express my gratitude towards her, she was like a family person who even responded during late nights around 3am when they were complications during pregnancy. Now she is the sole reason for all the happiness around me right now. She made the impossible thing possible Thank you so much Mam.

tags: None
review:
Posting on behalf of my wife:

Such a great experience. Very friendly and compassionate doctor. Took all the time to go over my questions. Would recommend to everyone as we all know pregnancy is such a roller coaster ride and being in good, warm and caring hands is a great relief.
Half the battle is won when you are in able hands like Dr. Padmini. 
Thank you Mam for all your support even in odd times !!
Will keep in touch :)

Explained each and every details of the problem.

review: Doctor was help full and she understands well and diagnos and treatment done so pacent can take call on his opinion

tags: None
review: Heavy wait time. We waited for 2 hours despite of online appointment. This is the not a pleasebt  situation for any patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She is indeed one of the best gynaecologist i have ever met... she is very friendly and very professional at the same time ...she will explain everything in detail...
If you have any problem any issues just got her with no worries...
I have got my first child delivered by her and have had an amazing experience without any worries...
Thank you for supporting us in all our problems Dr.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for pregnancy checkup, she is very polite and explain each and every issues and consequences too, I am extremely satisfied that I finally got a good doctor after changing 2 doctors and one think I like her most that she always give preference to patient health first and doesn't force us to go to specific diagnostic centre or pharmacy hence she always gives a good suggestion for what to do next.

tags: None
